# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and functionality. This item is worth more than $150 to me, but I believe in making deals that are mutually beneficial. I am offering it to you for $200. It includes all the features you're looking for and more, ensuring a high-quality experience. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your needs with our top-tier product. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
